vlive.korean: 이 음악 계속 틀어놓고 해야겠어 분위기 조성해야지. Let's leave this music on and keep going. We have to create the mood. 듣기 View video B.A.P : Happy halloween babys

vlive.korean: [1] [공포감 조성하는 딸깍 소리] - 어디 나와? 어디 나왔? - 뭐야? 뭐야? [1] [The clicking sound is intimidating] - Where is it coming from? - What was that? 듣기 View video YG 보석함 (YG TREASURE BOX) : YG보석함ㅣGAME CAM

[대결 분위기 조성] 둘러싸야 된다고 뭔지 알지? We have to surround them, you know what I mean? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 11회 - 쥐어뜯는(?) 음악으로 댄스 대결하는 세븐틴 디에잇 vs 우지

examples.korean: They accused him of fomenting political unrest. 발음듣기 그들은 그가 정치 불안을 조성한다고 비난했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They accused him of fomenting political unrest. 발음

examples.korean: The town centre was zoned for office development. 발음듣기 시내 중심부는 사무실 조성 지구로 지정되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town centre was zoned for office development. 발음

examples.korean: They have created an environment in which productivity should flourish. 발음듣기 그들은 생산성이 활성화될 수 있는 환경을 조성했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have created an environment in which productivity should flourish. 발음

examples.korean: delightful formal gardens, with terraced lawns and an avenue of trees 발음듣기 계단 모양의 잔디밭과 나무가 늘어선 길이 있는, 양식을 갖춰 조성한 아주 보기 좋은 정원들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: delightful formal gardens, with terraced lawns and an avenue of trees 발음

examples.korean: We’ll need to raise more money next year. 발음듣기 우리가 내년에는 돈을 더 많이 모금[조성]해야 할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll need to raise more money next year. 발음
